PROJECT, TITLE: No Side Stream, Smoke Focus Groups
Key Criteria For Analysis: To determine if the NSS concept/ product is viable based upon smokers reactions.
Research Limitations: Information from this exploratory research is directional only.
Research Design (N, Cells, Elegibility,: Three Groups (1 male/ 2 female) will be conducted in Ridgewood, N. J. on May 7th, to explore the NSS concept/ product., The groups will be comprised of random Reduced Tar smokers. No group will, be over represented by brand, type or size of cigarettes., All smokers will be 18 years and over and smoke 10+ cigarettes per day.
